data.title: Westfield Washington School District
data.text:
2024-25 Virginia F Wood Early Learning Center Open House

Please plan to attend the 2024-25 open house on Thursday, January 4, 2024. We will offer a brief building tour of a few classrooms and common areas. You can choose to attend either at 5:30 PM or 6:00 PM at Virginia F Wood Early Learning Center.

Posted at the top of this web page is the recorded virtual parent information meeting for 2024-25 TOTS and All Aboard programs. The virtual meeting includes details about the programs, instructions to submit enrollment and the placement process.

2024-25 TOTS and All Aboard Materials

Below are the links to download information and pricing for the 2024-25 program.

2024-25_TOTS_and_All_Aboard_Calendar

2024-25_TOTS_& All_Aboard Rates

What does each plan include for 2024-25_TOTS_and_All_Aboard

2024-25 TOTS and All Aboard Open Enrollment

January 8, 2024 at 6:00 AM through February 5, 2024 at 11:59 PM

You must complete the steps listed below by February 5, 2024 to submit your child's 2024-25 TOTS enrollment for consideration.

Submit online enrollment between January 8, 2024 starting 6:00 AM through February 5, 2024 ending 11:59 PM. Click here to download the EZ ChildTrack Online Enrollment instructions

Click 2024-25 TOTS Child Information and Enrollment Application to download, print and complete.

The following must be received by February 5, 2024 by 4:00 PM to the address listed below:

A $175 registration check made payable to Westfield Washington Schools

A copy of your child's birth certificate

Proof of residency by submitting a copy of a utility bill, purchase agreement, or rental agreement

Virginia F Wood Early Learning Center

19500 Tomlinson Road, Suite A

Westfield, IN 46074

Attn Donna Benedict

TOTS Program Information

School Cancellation and Delays

Click here for TOTS and All Aboard weather delays and closure instructions. Parents will receive a text message and/or an email from the district when this occurs.

Staff Development Days and Parent/Teacher Conference Days

The TOTS classrooms will meet as regularly scheduled on staff development days and parent/teacher conference days. These days must coincide with your child's service days according to when your child normally attends.

Break Plans for Preschool

Preschool Break Care Plans are available to any child enrolled in the 2024-2025 TOTS Preschool and Pre-k classrooms. There is no break care for Infants and Toddlers. Break care plans (Fall, Winter, and Spring Break) are open to online enrollment through your EZ ChildTrack account up until 14 days prior to the start of each break. Withdraw requests must be emailed to mychild@wws.k12.in.us a minimum of 14 days prior to the start of the break to avoid charges.

Break care will be at Virginia F Wood Early Learning Center. Student Support Programs reserve the right to change the location due to circumstances beyond our control and/or cancel any of the Break Care Plans if enrollment does not support the requirements to open. In this case, parents will be notified as soon as possible.

Online enrollment for each break is open until 14 days prior to the start of each break, and you have the flexibility to select specific days to attend during the breaks for child care. Each break is open for online enrollment until 14 days prior to the start of the break. Families may cancel break enrollment by the same deadline date, 14 days prior to the start of each break.

Fall Break 2024 (enroll or withdraw by 10-7-24)

October 21-25, 2024

Winter Break 2024-25 (enroll or withdraw by 12-9-24)

December 23, December 26-31, and January 2-3 (closed 12-24, 12-25, and 1-1)

Spring Break 2025 (enroll or withdraw by 3-21-25)

April 4-11, 2025
